content: across 10 st cast on section by interspersing four m1 sts in the slack that appears between sts as you knit they can be m1r or m1l depending on how you made the cast on loops in total 72 sts previous round just make them to match k11 repeat from * knit 5 more rounds in stockinette lace pattern place marker in last st of round to avoid confusion and miscounts with yarn overs round 1 *yo twice k2tog repeat from * round 2 knit around dropping first yo of each repeat on previous round repeat rnds 1 and 2 for pattern moving stitch marker up as you go for a total of 22 repeats count the holes marching diagonally up the bag bottom knit a round 1 of lace pattern then round 1 k2tog around dropping one yo of each repeat of lace pattern total 36 sts total 36 sts round 2 *yo once k2tog repeat from * switch to double pointed needles here total 18 sts round 3 k1 around dropping yo total 18 sts round 4 repeat round 2 total 9 sts repeat last two rounds total 9 sts round 7 knit around cut yarn thread tail through yarn needle and finish off by running yarn tail through these live sts twice for cotton market bags i finish yarn ends thus tie a hard double knot on the inside dab knot with a couple of drops of fray check or waterproof glue and let dry before trimming yarn it ll survive much abuse with no frayed ends to pop out abbreviations k knit st s stitch es round s round s k2tog knit two together yo yarn over m1 make 1 stitch by lifted strand method also m1r make 1 right and m1l make 1 left ©2012 jana trent make as many bags as you wish to use gift or sell but do not sell the pattern or post it to other websites thank you
